name: Simov
description:
Simov is an atmospheric puzzle game where you play as a robot in search of his purpose. Originally made for GMCJam 15, in which it won Best Presentation.

He rebooted in the rotting shell of a once-prosperous laboratory. Everywhere he goes, he sees the metallic remains of what were once his friends. Can Simov piece together the remnants of his memories and escape?

Controls:

Arrow Keys | Move

Z          | Interact

Escape     | Quit the game
